verbs.description: [ARG1: South Korea 's national security adviser] [V: is] [ARG2: in Washington] [ARGM-PRP: to meet his U.S. counterpart , John Bolton , ahead of an expected summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , officials in Washington and Seoul said .

[ARG0: South Korea 's national security adviser] is in Washington to [V: meet] [ARG1: his U.S. counterpart , John Bolton] , ahead of an expected summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , officials in Washington and Seoul said .

South Korea 's national security adviser is in Washington to meet his U.S. counterpart , John Bolton , ahead of an [V: expected] [ARG1: summit] between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , officials in Washington and Seoul said .

[ARG1: South Korea 's national security adviser is in Washington to meet his U.S. counterpart , John Bolton , ahead of an expected summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: officials in Washington and Seoul] [V: said] .
